title: Lufttransport Staffel 5
text:
The Lufttransport Staffel 5 (LT St 5, <a href="French%20Language">French</a> "Escadrille Transport Aérien 5 ") is a transport <a href="Squadron%20%28aviation%29">squadron</a> of the <a href="Swiss%20Air%20Force">Swiss Air Force</a>. The homebase of the Lufttransport Staffel 5 is the <a href="Payerne%20Air%20Base">Payerne Air Base</a>.
The Lufttransport Staffel 5 is part of the Lufttransportgeschwader 1 together with the <a href="Lufttransport%20Staffel%201">Lufttransport Staffel 1</a> (French "Escadrille Transport Aérien «La UNE»" ). The <a href="coat%20of%20arms">coat of arms</a> of the Lufttransport Staffel 1 is a side view of a green <a href="grasshopper">grasshopper</a> in front of a white circular ground, which shows the white number 5 on one of its wings. 
The camouflage version of the coat of arms shows the same image, but in dark green shades.
History.
The air transport unit and company 5 was founded in March 1962 as a light-transport unit 5 under the command of Hauptmann (Captain)Fritz Kolb. The Lufttransport Staffel 5 used Piper Super Cub, Hiller UH-12 B, <a href="Alouette%20II">Alouette II</a> and Dornier Do 27 on the military airfield <a href="Reichenbach%20im%20Kandertal">Reichenbach</a> and on the Military airfield <a href="Frutigen">Frutigen</a>. In 1964, the <a href="Pilatus%20P-2">Pilatus P-2</a> was introduced by the Lufttransport Staffel 5 and from 1965 on the military airfield Kägiswil became the wartime home base of the unit. At the end of the 1960s, the <a href="Pilatus%20PC-6">Pilatus PC-6</a> and the Junkers Ju 52 were used by the Lufttransport Staffel 5. From 1974 to 2010 the <a href="Alouette%20III">Alouette III</a> was used by the Lufttransport Staffel 5. As of 1992, the Lufttransport Staffel 5 operated the AS332M1 Super Puma. These were stationed at the <a href="Interlaken%20Airport">Interlaken Air Base</a> airport until 2003. The AS532UL Cougar was also entering service at the Lufttransport Staffel 5 and in 2010 followed the <a href="Eurocopter%20EC635">Eurocopter EC635</a>.
The task of the Lufttransport Staffel 5 is the air transport with helicopters throughout <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a>.
